pullRequest.title: [GEOT-6510] Upgrade Apache Commons Collections from v3 to v4
pullRequest.bodyText:
This change migrates code inside Geotools itself, as well as updating
Apache Commons Digester to the first newer version that doesn't depend
on Apache Commons Collections v3 directly anymore.
(Apache Commons Digester still depends on Apache Commons Collections v3
via Apache Commons BeanUtils, but this will be fixable in the future
after Apache Commons BeanUtils v2 (which depends on Apache Commons
Collections v4) is released.

beforeCommit.message:
GEOT-6510 Upgrade Apache Commons Collections from v3 to v4

This change migrates code inside Geotools itself, as well as updating
Apache Commons Digester to the first newer version that doesn't depend
on Apache Commons Collections v3 directly anymore.

(Apache Commons Digester still depends on Apache Commons Collections v3
via Apache Commons BeanUtils, but this will be fixable in the future
after Apache Commons BeanUtils v2 (which depends on Apache Commons
Collections v4) is released.

nodes.bodyText: why change to a keyset if you are going to do a map.get(key) later anyways?
